messages.messageBody:
Did a mapquest from my house:

Total Est. Time: 45 hours, 38 minutes Total Est. Distance:
3046.65 miles

Darn it - just a tad too far for a picnic! <G>

I was SORELY tempted, though, especially by this comment:

> Nazi control freaks are not welcome.

Thanks for the open invitation, anyway! ENJOY!

-pam






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Radical Unschooling Pool Party in Cape Cod, MA
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, We would like to invite you to join us for our first annual unschooling pool party on Saturday, August 26 from 2:00 - ?  BYOF (food) and towels.  We ll
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

We would like to invite you to join us for our first annual unschooling pool
party on Saturday, August 26 from 2:00 - ? BYOF (food) and towels. We'll
have food to share as well. We have plenty of chairs, a trampoline, a pool and a
sand pit with a playground on it. If it's not 100 degrees we'll have a
bonfire, too.

We are in Mashpee, MA which is on Cape Cod, about 15 minutes from the Bourne
Bridge. We are 1 hour from Boston or Providence.

We welcome veteran unschoolers as well as newbies like ourselves. Any
families who treat each other kindly and respectfully and who want to learn more
about radical unschooling.

Nazi control freaks are not welcome. We just had that party! We want kids
who are free to have popsicles and watermelon before having finish their mad
cow burgers. Okay, that's another post...

Hope you can join us!

Warmly,
Robin, new to radical unschooling and loving it along with hubby-Ron,
Melissa-9, Sam-7, Madison-3 and Anthony-6, our newest addition (fostering).

Please e-mail me privately for directions and feel free to forward this to
any other lists where unschoolers are lurking.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
